sentence.Network_en: After a bath or shower rub down the whole body with a loofah.
sentence.Network_cn: 在洗澡或淋浴后，用丝瓜络按摩身体。

sentence.Network_en: Loofah body is uneven, the head also wore a yellow color of the flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 丝瓜身上是凹凸不平的, 头上还顶着个黄颜色的小花.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Egyptian Arabic lūfa, denoting the plant

entry.def: A loofah is a long rough sponge-like piece of plant fibre which you use to scrub your body.

means.word_mean: 1. the dried fibrous part of the fruit of a plant of the genus Luffa; used as a washing sponge or strainer

auth_sentence.content: The loofah and the sponge were the dried-out bodies, the skeletons, of living things.

auth_sentence.content: The loofah was stringy and matted, the sponge was branching and vacuous, the pumice was riddled with needle holes.
